items.title: Login Page Implementation
items.description: Develop a login page allowing users to authenticate with username/email and password before accessing the chat application.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter username/email and password in designated input fields
Login button is enabled only when both fields are filled
System validates credentials against the backend authentication service
On successful login, user is redirected to the chat interface
On failed login, an error message is displayed without page reload
non_functional: Page should load within 2 seconds on standard broadband
Support responsive design for mobile and desktop
Ensure secure transmission of credentials via HTTPS

notes: Assumed standard username/email and password authentication; no mention of social login or multi-factor authentication.
